Other Info About Me

I am secretly just a robot trying to blend in with humans and you have now discovered my true identity. Whatever shall I do....

I am sorry I lied to you dear reader, but the above statement is in fact, not a fact. This is just a page that I am not sure what to put on as of yet. I could list some cool facts about myself, start some long rant on a random topic, or just delete this page entirely. Until further notice, this is just a page with hidden text. Good job on discovering this easter egg I guess.
